title: can you buy rp with a visa debit card
body: so I got a visa debit card / gift card for m birthday and I want to buy some rp and now I see there is no option for debit so like plz help

replies.body: Absolutely! You'll need to put that gift card in as a normal credit/debit card, and make sure to put the info in as it appears on the card itself. If you're still having any problems, feel free to hit me back up or reach out to our billing agents in a [**ticket**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new).

so I did and the card came with a pin number but there is no pin number option right  and it says it declined in terms of a service provider and I selected visa and I am using a visa gift card so I'm still confused and used everthing on the card even had my dad and mom help me

Double check the info on that card to make sure it matched what you put in, and you shouldn't need the pin at all. If you're still having problems, hit up those billing agents in a [**ticket**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new)!
